mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysAdminStplatAgr Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ADMIN_ID , BO_SITE_ID , STPLAT_CD , STPLAT_AGR_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_ADMIN_STPLAT_AGR WHERE 1 = 1 AND ADMIN_ID = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BO_SITE_ID = #{boSiteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STPLAT_CD = #{stplatCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
